abstract: Job cuts and a lower tax rate helped the maker of construction equipment, which said it saw signs of economic stabilization.
snippet: Job cuts and a lower tax rate helped the maker of construction equipment, which said it saw signs of economic stabilization.
lead_paragraph: Caterpillar posted a second-quarter profit on Tuesday that exceeded analysts’ highest estimates, aided by job cuts and a lower tax rate. The company, the maker of construction equipment, raised its full-year forecast, saying stimulus programs were starting to support global demand.
